```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(readxl)
library(readr)
library(lubridate)
library(tidyverse)
```



```{r}
clean_pbp <- function(filename){
  new_tibble <- read_excel(str_c("~/Desktop/Sports Analytics/STO_WBB_2022_23/data/", filename, ".xlsx"))
  new_data <- new_tibble%>%
    select(88, 114:124, date, visname, homename)%>%
    filter(!is.na(action))%>%
    rename(quarter = number)%>%
    mutate(date = mdy(date))
}

```


```{r}
clean_pbp("11_11_Alma_PBP")
```
